gdd.source: Do not edit! This file automatically created by xmlUtil/v1/src/forDoc.exe

primCategory.name: globalMatPrim
primCategory.overview: Materials not specific to a single subsystem.
primCategory.prim: Wall material
Need vacuum for some 'solids'

primCategory.name: globalCountPrim
primCategory.overview: Counts of objects more inclusive than a single subsystem; also other integer constants used in identifiers.
primCategory.prim: Number of towers in x.
Number of towers in y.
Id field value for CAL (within towers)
Id field value for TKR (within towers)
Id field value for LAT
Id field value for solar panels
Id field value for spacecraft
id field for towers (within LAT)
id field for ACD (within LAT)

primCategory.name: globalDimPrim
primCategory.overview: Fundamental dimensions and offsets for objects not associated with any single subsystem.
primCategory.prim: Width of a single CAL-TKR module. THIS IS TOO BIG -- NEED NEW CAL NUMBERS
Spacing between tracker and calorimeter
gap between modules
Wall thickness
width of tower, including walls.
Distance between centers of towers (X or Y)

primCategory.name: CALMatPrim
primCategory.prim: Crystal Material
Diode Material
Wrap material for CsI logs
Material for CAL frame
Material for space between CAL layers
Material for CAL grid
Material for CAL flange

primCategory.name: CALCountPrim
primCategory.overview: Counts for replicated objects in the Calorimeter; other integer constants used to keep track of identifiers.
primCategory.prim: Number of layers of CAL CsI crystals
Number of crystals per layer within a tower
idField value for CAL log field (the CsI crystal)
idField value for CAL log field (a diode)
idField value for diode field (minus, small)
idField value for diode field (plus, small)
idField value for diode field (minus, large)
idField value for diode field (plus, large)

primCategory.name: CALDimPrim
primCategory.overview: Fundamental dimensions of solids and offsets for the Calorimeter
primCategory.prim: Thickness of diodes
Width of diodes
Height of large diode
Height of a small diode
Length of a CsI crystal. Too big??
(Transverse) width of a CsI crytal
Height of a CsI crystal
Y (transverse) offset of diode relative to crystal
Z offset of large diode relative to crystal
Z offset of small diode relative to crystal
Transverse distance between logs
Gap between CAL layers
Thickness of CAL frame sides
Thickness of top and bottom of CAL frame
Thickness of CAL grid between towers
Thickness of CAL grid on outside towers
** Need meaningful comment here**

primCategory.name: TKRMatPrim
primCategory.overview: Materials used in the TKR description
primCategory.prim: material used in tracker conversion
Material of tracker detector elements
material used in tracker tray core
Material of tracker face sheet

primCategory.name: TKRCountPrim
primCategory.overview: Counts of objects and other quantities used to form identifiers within the tracker.
primCategory.prim: Number of strips per wafer
Wafers for a layer within a tower form a square array of this dimension
number of trays (one more than number of x-y planes)
number of trays with no converter. These trays have the lowest tray number
number of trays with super-Glast thickness converter. These are immediately above the no-lead trays
Number of front-end readout strips per die (determines number of Si strips)
Field value for Si field (bottom of tray)
Field value for Si field (top of tray)

primCategory.name: TKRDimPrim
primCategory.overview: Fundamental solid dimensions and offsets within the Tracker.
primCategory.prim: Si thickness
Thickness of core material in all trays except the bottom
Core thickness for bottom tray
Thickness of glue between Si and bias plane
Thickness of glue between non-Si components
Thickness of conversion material in "regular" layers in mm
Thickness of conversion material in super-GLAST layers in mm
Face sheet thickness for all but super-glast layers
Face sheet thickness for super-glast layers
Thickness of bias plane
Gap between top of one tray and bottom of the tray above
Height of a tracker tower
gap between Si dies (superseded/obsolete?)
Length and width of Si wafer
Length and width of active area on a wafer
**Is this just a replacement for wallWidth?
X and y width of face sheet
**Insert comment here**
gap between ladders
Center-to-center distance between trays. Obsolete. Now gap between trays is constant
Thickness of converter + core?? Probably obsolete
guard ring size. Probably irrelevant.

primCategory.name: ACDMatPrim
primCategory.overview: Materials used in the ACD description
primCategory.prim: material used for tiles
Material of ACD support. Still need input from engineers about this.
Material for scintillating tape

primCategory.name: ACDCountPrim
primCategory.overview: Counts of objects and other quantities used to form identifiers within the ACD.
primCategory.prim: Number of tiles across top in x direction
Number of tiles across top in y direction
Number of gaps (long axis = Z) to be covered by scintillating tape on each side o the ACD. Should this be derived from #tiles in some side row?
Number of rows of tiles along the sides
Number of tiles in some (currently upper two) side rows
Number of tiles in some (currently lower two) side rows
Top of ACD
Neg. x face
Neg. y face
Pos. x face
Pos. y face

primCategory.name: ACDDimPrim
primCategory.overview: Fundamental solid dimensions and offsets within the ACD.
primCategory.prim: Thickness of ACD tiles
This is just a figment of my imagination. I have no real number yet.
This one is right if side_standoff is another name for side_tile_standoff, the distance between the side of the tracker and the ACD tiles
This is the total amount of space available to top section of the ACD, includes tiles and support structure (Heather).
Worst-case (most thermal expansion) gap between tiles on the top
distance between ACD top and top of TKR
Width of overlap of overlapped top tiles
Total amount of space available for side section of ACD, including both tiles and support structure
Height of top row of side tiles
Height of 2nd row of side tiles
Height of 3rd row of side tiles
Height of 4th row of side tiles
Distance side tiles extend above topACD tile surface --- used for positioning
Vertical gap between (rows of?) side tiles
Horizontal gap at the corners between adjacent sides of tiles
Thickness of scintillating tape
Width of scintillating tape
Distance tape should extend beyond the end of a top tile (see Heather's first diagram)
Distance between the tape and the adjacent ACD tile

const.name: diodePosXOffset
const.notes: X-offset of a diode relative to the center of the CsI crystal

const.name: diodeNegXOffset
const.notes: X-offset of diode on negative end of a crystal

const.name: CALHalfGap
const.notes: convenience

const.name: CsIEnvX
const.notes: Long dimension of envelope containing a CsI crystal and its diodes

const.name: CsIEnvY
const.notes: Transverse dimension of envelope containing a CsI crystal and its diodes

const.name: CsIEnvZ
const.notes: Height of the envelope containing a CsI crystal and its diodes

const.name: CALLayerTrans
const.notes: Transverse dimension of a CAL layer: max(CsiEnvX, nEltPerlayer*CsIEnvY)

const.name: CALTotalZ
const.notes: Includes cal layers and inter-layer spacers, but not frame, grid, etc.

const.name: CALFrameWidth
const.notes: transverse dimension for cal frame (one tower)

const.name: CALFrameHeight
const.notes: Height of entire frame

const.name: CALFrameSide_d
const.notes: Displacement of a side frame relative to tower

const.name: CALFrameSide_dN
const.notes: Displacement of a side frame relative to tower

const.name: CALFrameTB_d
const.notes: Displacement of top and bottom of frame, relative to the whole.

const.name: CALFrameTB_dN
const.notes: Displacement of top and bottom of frame, relative to the whole.

const.name: inactiveThickUpperReg
const.notes: Inactive materials above core between Si and core for regular layers

const.name: inactiveThickUpperSuper
const.notes: Inactive materials above core between Si and core for superGlast layers

const.name: inactiveThickLowerNoCnv
const.notes: Inactive materials from core on down to Si for no cnv layers

const.name: inactiveThickBelowCnv
const.notes: Inactive materials below converter, above bottom Si

const.name: inactiveThickToCnvReg
const.notes: Inactive materials from core to converter, exclusive, for regular layers

const.name: inactiveThickToCnvSuper
const.notes: Inactive materials from core to converter, exclusive, for super-glast layers

const.name: inactiveThickOutside
const.notes: Inactive materials from outside (top of top or bottom of bottom layer) to core

const.name: outsideTrayZ
const.notes: Total Z dimension of top and bottom trays

const.name: middleTrayZ
const.notes: Total Z dimension of interior trays

const.name: xNumM1
const.notes: Convenience number

const.name: yNumM1
const.notes: Convenience number

const.name: towersTotalX
const.notes: Meant to be X width of the array of towers, but doesn't (yet) include grid

const.name: towersTotalY
const.notes: Meant to be X width of the array of towers, but doesn't (yet) include grid

const.name: towersTotalZ
const.notes: Height of cal + height of tracker + gap between

derCategory.name: derACD
derCategory.overview: Derived constants specific to the ACD

const.name: ACDTopTotalX
const.notes: Total X width to be covered by top tiles

const.name: ACDTotalX
const.notes: max extent in x of all of ACD

const.name: ACDTopTotalY
const.notes: Total Y width to be covered by top tiles

const.name: ACDTotalY
const.notes: max extent in y of all of ACD

const.name: ACDTopXWidth
const.notes: X dimension for a top tile. Must be derived from total width top and other things. Tiles overlap in X.

const.name: ACDTopYWidth
const.notes: Y dimension for a top tile. Derived from total width, size of gaps.

const.name: sideOverlapToTopTape
const.notes: Distance from top of side tile to top of top tape

const.name: ACDTopZHalfWidth
const.notes: for convenience

const.name: tapeHalfThickness
const.notes: for convenience

const.name: ACDSideThick
const.notes: Tile thickness + tape thickness + gap (ACD sides)

const.name: ACDTotalXSide
const.notes: total length (in x direction) to be covered by a row of side tiles

const.name: sideTileWidthShortXRow
const.notes: to get width of an individual tile, take account of number of tiles in a row (and number of gaps)."Short" refers to the fact that the row has only 5 tiles

const.name: sideTileWidthLongXRow
const.notes: Same as above for a long (10-tile) row

const.name: ACDTotalYSide
const.notes: Same as above but for Y sides

const.name: ACDSideHeight
const.notes: Total height of an ACD side: tiles plus gaps

const.name: sideTileWidthShortYRow
const.notes: Same idea as for ACD X-side tiles

const.name: sideTileWidthLongYRow
const.notes: Same idea as for ACD X-side tiles

const.name: sideTileRow0_d
const.notes: Z-Displacement for top row (row 0) of side tiles (X and Y), relative to the center of a box containing the side

const.name: sideTileRow1_d
const.notes: Displacement for row 1 side tiles (X and Y)

const.name: sideTileRow2_d
const.notes: Displacement for row 2 side tiles (X and Y)

const.name: sideTileRow3_d
const.notes: Displacement for row 3 side tiles (X and Y)

const.name: tapeSideLength
const.notes: length of scintillating tape on a side (assume a single piece going from top to bottom for now

const.name: topTapeLenLong
const.notes: lengths of tape convering gaps in the top. There are 3 different lengths to deal with the fact that tiles in different top rows are obscured differeng amounts by overlap. The longest tape goes over the outermost tiles, the shortest across the central row. See Heather's first diagram

const.name: topTapeLenMedium
const.notes: Length of top tapes for rows 1 and 3

const.name: topTapeLenShort
const.notes: Length of top tape for central row: row 2

const.name: topTapesPerRow
const.notes: Tapes on top come in columns, similar to tiles, except there is one less piece of tape than there are tiles in a row

const.name: topTapeGap
const.notes: gap between adjacent pieces of (top)tape in the same row

const.name: topTapeX4_d
const.notes: x-displacement for a top tape in row 4 relative to the "top ACD" envelope

const.name: topTapeX3_d
const.notes: x-displacement for a top tape in row 3

const.name: topTapeX2_d
const.notes: x-displacement for a top tape in row 2

const.name: topTapeX1_d
const.notes: x-displacement for a top tape in row 1

const.name: topTapeX0_d
const.notes: x-displacement for a top tape in row 0

const.name: topTapeZLong_d
const.notes: Z displacement for a long (row 0 or 4) top tape

const.name: topTapeZMedium_d
const.notes: Z displacement for a medium (row 1 or 3) top tape

const.name: topTapeZShort_d
const.notes: Z displacement for a top tape in row 2

const.name: topTileZEdge_d
const.notes: Z displacement for a top tile in rows 0 or 4

const.name: topTileZMedium_d
const.notes: Z displacement for a top tile in rows 1 or 3

const.name: topTileZCenter_d
const.notes: Z displacement for a top tile in row 2

const.name: topTileX2_d
const.notes: middle row is centered in X

const.name: topTileX3_d
const.notes: X-displacement for a top tile in row 3

const.name: topTileX4_d
const.notes: X-displacement for a top tile in row 4

const.name: topTileX0_d
const.notes: X-displacement for a top tile in row 0

const.name: topTileX1_d
const.notes: X-displacement for a top tile in row 1

const.name: betweenSideTapesX
const.notes: gap between two tapes on an ACD X-side

const.name: betweenSideTapesY
const.notes: gap between two tapes on an ACD Y-side

const.name: ACDSideDovetail_d
const.notes: Side tiles and tapes on sides parallel to X-axis have a displacement in X of this amount. Those on sides || to Y are displaced in Y the same amount

derCategory.name: derGlobal
derCategory.overview: A few more constants needed for the outermost LAT composition

const.name: LATX
const.notes: X-dimension of an envelope for the LAT

const.name: LATY
const.notes: Y-dimension of an envelope for the LAT

const.name: LATZ
const.notes: Z-dimension of an envelope for the LAT

const.name: LATZHalf
const.notes: convenience

const.name: ACDTop_d
const.notes: Z displacement of top ACD relative to LATenv, the envelope volume containing them + ACD

const.name: allTowers_d
const.notes: Z displacement of towers relative to LATenv

const.name: tileSide_dz
const.notes: displacement in z of side tiles rel. to LATenv

const.name: tileXSide_dy
const.notes: Displacement in y of tiles along a side || to X axis, relative to center of LATenv

const.name: tileXSide_dyN
const.notes: Displacement in y of tiles along a side || to X axis, neg direction, relative to center of LATenv

const.name: tileYSide_dx
const.notes: Displacement in x of tiles along a side || to Y axis, relative to center of LATenv

const.name: tileYSide_dxN
const.notes: Displacement in x of tiles along a side || to Y axis, neg direction, relative to center of LATenv

const.name: tapeSide_dz
const.notes: displacement in z of side tapes rel. to LATenv

const.name: tapeXSide_dy
const.notes: Displacement in y of tapes along a side || to X axis, relative to center of LATenv

const.name: tapeXSide_dyN
const.notes: Displacement in y of tapes along a side || to X axis, neg direction, relative to center of LATenv

const.name: tapeYSide_dx
const.notes: Displacement in x of tapes along a side || to Y axis, relative to center of LATenv

const.name: tapeYSide_dxN
const.notes: Displacement in x of tapes along a side || to Y axis, neg direction, relative to center of LATenv
